    Finding Optimal Designs

    Optimal Two-Stage Designs

    The technical background in available at arxiv.org.

    BinaryTwoStageDesigns.optimaldesign — Method.
    optimaldesign(
  n1::Integer,
  parameters::Parameters,
  solver::MathProgBase.AbstractMathProgSolver
)

    Find the optimal two-stage design for given parameters and fixed stage-one sample size.

    Parameters

    ParameterDescription
    n1stage-one sample size
    nparametersparamters object defining the optimality criterion
    solverMathProgBase solver used for optimization
    VERBOSEcontrol verbosity during optimization

    Return Value

    Design object optimized for given parameter set.

    Examples

    julia> ss     = SimpleSampleSpace(10:25, 100, n2min = 5)
julia> design = optimaldesign(15, params, solver = Gurobi.GurobiSolver())
